titleStmt.title: Questions, concernyng conie-hood, and the nature of the conie Of which, vnder the moderatorship of honie-mouth Stengler, conie-catcher: Merie-pate, the knaue of clubbes, being aunswerer. To take degree in the same facultie shalbe disputed: [...]
titleStmt.author: Greene, Robert, 1558?-1592, attributed name. aut

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: "R.R."; sometimes attributed to Robert Greene.
